p: Health facility-based participants were from various disciplines, including clinicians (nurses, clinical officers and doctors), laboratory staff, HMIS/records and surveillance officers. Participants were drawn from all levels of the health system; 79% (4337/5489) of the operational health workers were from lower level facilities (HCIIs and HCIIIs), 11% were from HCIVs and 10% from the district and regional referral hospitals. All the districts had more than 80% of the public health facilities represented. High volume private for private health facilities were also included (TableÂ 2).
